scripts.build:impl: npx pdf-document-maker --template-header templates/impl-header.html --height-header 20mm --template-footer templates/impl-footer.html --height-footer 20mm --document-dir documents --pdf-output PDF --html-output out --title 'Implementation for utilizing enumeration schemas in the OpenADR RI' --format A4 RI-Implementation.md
scripts.build:testing: npx pdf-document-maker --template-header templates/testing-header.html --height-header 20mm --template-footer templates/testing-footer.html --height-footer 20mm --document-dir documents --pdf-output PDF --html-output out --title 'RI testing that enumerated values are correct' --format A4 RI-Testing-Enumerated-Values.md
scripts.build:extend: npx pdf-document-maker --template-header templates/extend-header.html --height-header 20mm --template-footer templates/extend-footer.html --height-footer 20mm --document-dir documents --pdf-output PDF --html-output out --title 'Considering extensions to enumeration tables using Schema files' --format A4 Extensions-Enumerations.md
scripts.watch:impl: npx nodemon -e less,md,css,html,png,mmd --watch documents/RI-Implementation.md --exec npm run build:impl
scripts.watch:testing: npx nodemon -e less,md,css,html,png,mmd --watch documents/RI-Testing-Enumerated-Values.md --exec npm run build:testing
scripts.watch:extend: npx nodemon -e less,md,css,html,png,mmd --watch documents/Extensions-Enumerations.md --exec npm run build:extend
